help.desc:
Shows a description and format for a command.
Anything in <triangle brackets> is a required parameter, anything in (parentheses) is an optional parameter.

commands.desc: Get a list of categories and commands in a category

root.desc: Get the X root of a number

evaluate.desc: Execute a math equation with interchangeable variables

notate.desc: Convert a very large or very small number into scientific notation

area.desc: Get the area of a 2D geometric shape

volume.desc: Get the volume of a 3D geometric shape

solve.desc: Takes an algebraic expression and solves for a variable inside the expression

convert.desc: Convert a number value from one to another

simplify.desc: Converts a complex equation down to a simplified equation

group.desc: Takes a number and places it into it's respective numerical group

perimeter.desc: Get the area around the outside of a 2D shape

profile.desc: Get information about yours or another person's discord account(only what is permitted by the discord API)

poll.desc:
Create a poll that can be voted on by members of the server, only one poll can be active in a channel at a time.
Each option is separated by commas

vote.desc: Vote on an active poll in the current channel

nickname.desc: Change your nickname or another member's nickname in the server

kick.desc: Kick a member from the server

ban.desc: Ban a member from the server and clear 7 days of their messages

unban.desc: Unban a member with a mention or Username+tag

config.desc: Customizeable bot settings for your server

addrole.desc: Give a role or roles to a mentioned member or members

takerole.desc: Take a role or roles from a mentioned member or members

periodic.desc: Get information about an element from the Periodic Table of Elements, or PToE for short

respect.desc: Pay respects to an event by typing F

flip.desc: Flips a coin and gives an output of either heads or tails

flips.desc: Creates a coin-flipping streak and the probability of getting that pattern of flips(only useable after one flip command)

random.desc: Sends a random number into the channel

qr.desc: Turn any text into a scan-able QR code

create.desc: Create a role, channel or category. No webhooks yet, but I'm working on it!

delete.desc: Deletes a role, channel or category with a mention or by ID
